hero.title: Learn faster with your best language tutor
hero.description: Astrobrew is a free and open-source elegant landing page for Micro SaaS products built with Astro and Skeleton CSS

steps.title: Download from GitHub
steps.description: Click 'Get started for free' to clone the project

steps.title: Edit your content
steps.description: Update text, images, and links to match your brand

steps.title: Publish your site
steps.description: Deploy on GitHub Pages, Vercel, or your favorite platform

finalCta.title: Ready to start?
finalCta.description: Astrobrew helps you build a professional landing page in minutes

footer.text: Made with ❤️ by the Astro community
